scripts.clean:node: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf frontend/node_modules && rm -rf backend/node_modules
scripts.stage: git rm -r --cached . && git add . && git diff --cached --name-only | sort | uniq -c | sort -nr
scripts.install:py: cd rag_service && python3 -m venv venv && . venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:all: yarn install && cd frontend && yarn install && cd ../backend && yarn install && cd .. && yarn install:py
